_header: My mind is mickle on one that will me nought amende
Subjects: lover’s lament; illustrations, verse accompanying; Gawain
_description: Lament of a lover — one couplet with medial rhyme, with illustration showing Gawain and wife of Green Knight

BLCottNeroAX.Transcription:
Mi minde is mikul on on þat wil me noȝt amendeSum time was
                    trew as ston & fro schame couþe hir defende
